author: diaz🎞
text: so much for it to be something different and new, that seeing a lot of the stuff that already happened 25 years ago, left me a little bit underwhelmed. As much as I love this movie, this film didn’t cut deep like the og, but this movie is still a good and fun watch.

author: diaz🎞
text: for something new. As much as it is new, the film just didn’t uphold some of the expectations i had, and by the final act i was kinda left speechless, yet so confused how we got here. Don’t get me wrong, there are some great and shocking moments, but i feel like they hyped it up-

author: diaz🎞
text: Truly idk why I am posting this, bc scream com can’t really take anything but here we go. This is MY OPINION. Scream 2022 is good, but underwhelming for people who either watched the trailer too many times, as myself was one of those people. But also for people that were looking- https://t.co/lpYsohC453
